DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect Epoetin alfa therapy ( short term versus long term ) without home-based individualized exercise program incorporate aerobic strength resistance training patient treat high-dose chemotherapy autologous peripheral bloodstem cell transplantation ( PBSC T ) multiple myeloma . The endpoint study include number attempt total number day stem cell collection , number RBC platelet transfusion transplantation period , time-to-recovery transplantation , response intensive therapy multiple myeloma .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise Combination With Epoetin Alfa
DOC.criteria: Those high risk impend pathologic fracture cord compression , determine magnetic resonance image radiology report physician assessment , enrol Total Therapy treatment protocol invite participate study . Patients exclude show following attributes/conditions : Inability understand intent study Current diagnosis major psychiatric illness Presence microcytic macrocytic anemia Uncontrolled hypertension Red cell transfusion within 2 week ; Recombinant epoetin alfa within 8 week study enrollment .
